Summary: Slower than a meteor and larger than Venus
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Morgan Hill
There were no other sightings in Morgan Hill on or around October 23rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in a parking lot talking to my friend. Behind her in the sky at about the height of the tree line I noticed a bright larger sphere moving toward the earth. It was amber in color. Curiously it was going much slower than a meteor. I quickly asked my friend what was this thing. She turned to watch it for a few seconds and then it very oddly turned right and disappeared. Later this evening I went into my backyard to star gaze and saw two meteors streaking across the sky. The object I witnessed in the parking lot definitely did not move as these two meteors.
